attributes.action: keep Cadbury in Bourneville and by a british owned company
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If kraft foods wins to buy out Cadbury for £11.7 Billion - which Birmingaham based Cadburys has accepted the offer from Kraft we are signing this petition for you to keep cadbury in britain and in Bournville in Birmingham as it has every reason to do so - The Cadbury business began almost 200 years ago back in 1824 by John Cadbury though he may not be around today but his creation is a pure British production and is going strong as it was in 1824 so lets keep that way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
